mapper.select:
select * from (select * from (select code,category,class_name,nickname,total_student,to_char(signup,'YYYY-MM-DD') signup, to_char(allow,'YYYY-MM-DD') allow,class_state from class c join member m on c.userid=m.userid
where c.code like '%${searchWord}%' or c.category like '%${searchWord}%' or c.class_name like '%${searchWord}%' or c.userid like '%${searchWord}%' or c.class_state like '%${searchWord}%'
where ${option} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by c.code desc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord}) order by code asc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by code desc
select code,category,class_name,stage,full_price,real_price,good,allow,class_state,class_info, class_img,class_img2,class_term from class where code=#{code}
select code,section_code,unit,unit_content from section where code=#{param1} order by unit
mapper.update: update class set class_state='판매중', allow=sysdate where code='${code}'
mapper.select: select class_img from class where code='${code}'
select class_img2 from class where code='${code}'
mapper.update: update class set class_img2='${param1}' where code='${param2}'
mapper.select: select code,class_name from class where category='${param1}' order by code
select code from class where class_name='${param1}'
select max(unit) unit from section where code='${param1}'
select unit_content from section where code='${param1}' order by unit
select section_code from section where unit_content='${param1}'
mapper.update: MeRGE into section using dual on (section_code='${section_code}') when matched then update set unit=${unit},unit_content='${unit_content}' where section_code='${section_code}' when not matched then insert (code,section_code,unit,unit_content) values( '${code}','${section_code}',${unit},'${unit_content}')
mapper.select: select Section_sq.nextval from dual

select c.video_code,c.section_code,unit,unit_content,section_index,video_name,video_name, video_filename,substr(to_char(NUMTODSINTERVAL(video_length, 'second')),12,8) lengthStr, to_char(enroll_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') enroll_date from class_video c join section s on c.section_code=s.section_code where c.code='${param1}' order by s.unit asc,c.section_index asc
select category from class where code='${param1}'
select class_name from class where code='${param1}'
select unit from section where unit_content='${param1}'

select count(video_code) from class_video cv join class c on cv.code=c.code join member m on c.userid=m.userid where enroll_date between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}'
and category='${category}'
and category='${category}' and cv.video_code like '%${searchWord}%' or cv.video_name like '%${searchWord}%' or c.class_name like '%${searchWord}%' or cv.video_filename like '%${searchWord}%' or m.nickname like '%${searchWord}%'
and cv.video_code like '%${searchWord}%' or cv.video_name like '%${searchWord}%' or c.class_name like '%${searchWord}%' or cv.video_filename like '%${searchWord}%' or m.nickname like '%${searchWord}%'

select count(*) as cnt from class_review join member on class_review.userid = member.userid join class on class.code = class_review.code where to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')>=#{startDate} and to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')<=#{endDate}
and category='${category}'
and class_review.grade='${grade}'
and (class.code like '%${search}%' or class_review.userid like '%${search}%' or member.username like '%${search}%'or class.class_name like '%${search}%')
and category='${category}' and class_review.grade='${grade}'
and class_review.grade='${grade}' and (class.code like '%${search}%' or class_review.userid like '%${search}%' or member.username like '%${search}%'or class.class_name like '%${search}%')
and category='${category}' and (class.code like '%${search}%' or class_review.userid like '%${search}%' or member.username like '%${search}%'or class.class_name like '%${search}%')
and category='${category}' and class_review.grade='${grade}' and (class.code like '%${search}%' or class_review.userid like '%${search}%' or member.username like '%${search}%'or class.class_name like '%${search}%')
mapper.update: update class set class_img='${param1}' where code='${param2}'
